title: june 18: the first LP
description:
In this episode of 365 days with mxmtoon, Maia talks about the first LP record. After, she reflects on the Fleetwood Mac hit “Dreams.” Listen to this episode today and make sure you’re following along with the daily updates @365daysmxmtoon on all platforms.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: mxmtoon
